ownership.transferred: Des droits de propriété sur les licences sont-ils transférés?
manufacturer.name.listed: Le nom du fabricant révisé doit être indiqué dans le champ «nom de l'entreprise» dans la section des informations d'adresse ci-dessus
manufacturer.address.listed: L'adresse révisée du fabricant doit être répertoriée dans les champs de la section des informations d'adresse ci-dessus.
include.attestation: Veuillez inclure une attestation signée pour le changement de nom / d'adresse de l'usine de fabrication

contact.name: fr_REP Contact's Name
new.contact.name: Nom du nouveau contact
include.page1: Veuillez inclure la page de couverture de chaque licence concernée, un certificat valide du Programme d’audit unique des matériels médicaux [PAUMM] qui reflète le changement de nom ou d’adresse du fabricant, un formulaire F202 rempli et un formulaire d’attestation signé, le cas échéant.
mailto.label: fr_Submit to Health Canada
help.load.file.01: fr_A file should not be loaded if this is the first time enrolling the Company.
help.load.file.02: fr_When continuing with a working copy, the format of the file to load should be (.hcsc).
help.load.file.03: fr_When viewing/updating a draft or final XML file, the format of the file to load should be (.xml).
help.load.file.04: fr_Refresh template prior to loading file. Always load file into blank template.
help.heading.01: fr_The “Enrolment Status”, “Enrolment Version”, and “Date Last Saved” fields are automatically filled by the form upon selecting “Save Working Copy” or “Save Draft XML” in the bottom of the template.
help.heading.02: fr_The “Company Identifier” field will be filled by Health Canada when they generate the final company XML file.
help.heading.03: fr_The “Amend Enrolment” button is only enabled when a final company xml file is loaded into the template, and must be selected when amending a final company XML file.
help.business.num.01: fr_A business number is a unique, 9-digit number (i.e., the standard identifier for businesses). It is unique to a business or legal entity. Information on the business number can be found on the
help.status.01: fr_New - To add a  new contact.
help.status.02: fr_Revise - To request a revision to an active contact.
help.status.03: fr_Remove - To request the deactivation of an active contact.
help.status.04: fr_Active - Active contact for the company
help.des.renewal: fr_The party that should be contacted/notified annually for license renewal.
help.des.finance: fr_The party that should be contacted for any questions or issues related to fees.
help.routing.id.01: fr_The routing identifier is a unique identifier within the Electronic Submissions Gateway (ESG) for each account, used to identify the specific gateway account, whether it uses the Applicability Statement 2 (AS2) or WebTrader interfaces.
help.routing.id.01a: fr_Health Canada plans to use the routing identifier in the near future to send documents back to companies using the ESG. Companies will be notified before Health Canada begins implementing this new process. In the meantime, this field is optional, and the input routing identifier will only be stored in our internal databases for now.
help.routing.id.04: fr_For any further questions on the routing identifier, please contact the Food and Drug Administration Help Desk at
help.primary.contact: fr_The Primary REP contact is the person to be contacted by Health Canada if there are any issues or clarifications required for this template when it is submitted for finalization.
help.is.3rd.party: fr_Third party companies must obtain their Company Identifier and Contact Identifiers (by enrolling themselves using the REP Company template) prior to enrolling another company on their behalf.
help.contact.name: fr_This company representative full contact information should be listed in the company representative table above.
help.licence.num: fr_List all impacted licences, separated by a hard return (can copy and paste)
mailto.01: fr_The draft CO XML must be sent via email.
mailto.02: fr_By clicking this button, a templated email message should be auto-created using the your default email program. Before submitting, please attach your draft CO XML file.
mailto.03: fr_If an email was not automatically created, you can create an email and include the following:
mailto.06: fr_Body: The attached file is the draft CO XML
